com.glmapview

Class ImageManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.glmapview.ImageManager

  • public class ImageManager
extends java.lang.Object
    ImageManager used to render images from svgpb format and load images from resources.

      • open

        public android.graphics.Bitmap open(java.lang.String path,
                                    float scaleForVector,
                                    int tintColor)
        Opens image from assetManager
        Parameters:
        path - path to image
        scaleForVector - additional scale to use for vector image (actual scale will be screenScale*scaleForVector)
        tintColor - tint color to use for vector images
        Returns:
        Loaded bitmap or null
